title: Intentions for the Week
description: Intentions for the Week- Week 11 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 10! We survived another week. Yay us. How was your weekend? Did you have any time to yourself? Did you get to rest? Did you do meal prep? Do you know what’s for dinner tonight? I did meal prep yesterday and here what I worked on! Meal Prep includes: candied walnuts tuna salad carrots, celery, red peppers ranch dip white rice meaty pasta Thai broccoli salad steel cut oatmeal polenta shaved fennel Here are my Intentions for the Week: Intentions this Week This week’s intentions: Mind/Body reschedule doc morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily- break a sweat breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar art time floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins stay hydrated read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week i love lists record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools feb pages in currently workbook edit video post recipe organize tax stuff figure out next binder class SELF Check In! upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace bookkeeping/pay bills emails go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office paper piles laundry get more dirt/mulch order wipers plant things litterboxes water indoor plants go through pantry compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions: Mind/Body reschedule doc morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily- break a sweat breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar art time floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins stay hydrated read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week i love lists record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools feb pages in currently workbook edit video post recipe organize tax stuff figure out next binder class SELF Check In! upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace bookkeeping/pay bills emails go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office paper piles laundry bring soil up plant things litterboxes water indoor plants go through pantry compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage refill pill case garbage/recycling Posts to Inspire: Baked Meaty Spaghetti Spaghetti Pie Tuna Salad Vegan Ranch Dip Orange Creamsicle Popcorn Indian Curry Turkey Burgers Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! Here’s a mood: Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!! You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! Need extra help? Join my accountability group: SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. Those are my Intentions for the Week! Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU! The post Intentions for the Week appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Intentions for the Week is a weekly TO DO list series on Shutterbean.com, created by Tracy Benjamin of The Handwriting Club. What started as a personal planning ritual turned into a structured planner designed to help you organize your week with intention, creativity, and accountability. Follow along every Monday for inspiration, productivity tips, and a space to map out your goals!
text: Intentions for the Week- Week 11 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 10!  We survived another week. Yay us. How was your weekend? Did you have any time to yourself? Did you get to rest?  Did you do meal prep? Do you know what’s for dinner tonight?  I did meal prep yesterday and here what I worked on! Meal Prep includes:  candied walnuts tuna salad carrots, celery, red peppers ranch dip white rice meaty pasta Thai broccoli salad steel cut oatmeal polenta shaved fennel Here are my Intentions for the Week:  Intentions this Week  This week’s intentions:  Mind/Body reschedule doc  morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily- break a sweat breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar  art time floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools  feb pages in currently workbook edit video post recipe organize tax stuff figure out next binder class SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office paper piles  laundry  get more dirt/mulch order wipers plant things litterboxes water indoor plants  go through pantry  compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions:  Mind/Body reschedule doc  morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily- break a sweat breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar  art time floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools  feb pages in currently workbook edit video post recipe organize tax stuff figure out next binder class SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office paper piles  laundry  bring soil up plant things litterboxes water indoor plants  go through pantry  compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Posts to Inspire:  Baked Meaty Spaghetti Spaghetti Pie  Tuna Salad  Vegan Ranch Dip Orange Creamsicle Popcorn Indian Curry Turkey Burgers Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations!  Here’s a mood:  Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action.  My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder.  It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack!  Need extra help? Join my accountability group: SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together.  Those are my Intentions for the Week!  Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
html:
Intentions for the Week- Week 11 in 2025

Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 10!  We survived another week. Yay us. How was your weekend?

Did you have any time to yourself?

Did you get to rest? 

Did you do meal prep?

Do you know what’s for dinner tonight? 

I did meal prep yesterday and here what I worked on!

Meal Prep includes: 

  • candied walnuts
  • tuna salad
  • carrots, celery, red peppers
  • ranch dip
  • white rice
  • meaty pasta
  • Thai broccoli salad
  • steel cut oatmeal
  • polenta
  • shaved fennel

Here are my Intentions for the Week: 

Intentions this Week 

This week’s intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • reschedule doc 
  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • move body daily- break a sweat
  • breath work
  • work in Currently workbook
  • check-in with calendar 
  • art time
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • tracy’s tracking tools 
  • feb pages in currently workbook
  • edit video
  • post recipe
  • organize tax stuff
  • figure out next binder class
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos
  • recipe testing
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • organize my office
  • paper piles 
  • laundry 
  • get more dirt/mulch
  • order wipers
  • plant things
  • litterboxes
  • water indoor plants 
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Last Week’s Intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • reschedule doc 
  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal

  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • tracy’s tracking tools 
  • feb pages in currently workbook
  • edit video

  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos
  • recipe testing

Posts to Inspire: 

Baked Meaty Spaghetti

Spaghetti Pie 

Tuna Salad 

Vegan Ranch Dip

Orange Creamsicle Popcorn

Indian Curry Turkey Burgers

Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies

If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! 

Here’s a mood: 

Mantra for the week!

Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. 

My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year!

I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. 

It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! 

Need extra help? Join my accountability group:

SELF-CHECK-IN

We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. 

Those are my Intentions for the Week! 

Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
